definition: Congtai district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei
Congtai district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei

sentences.english: She won't go to Congtai Park tomorrow.
She will go to Congtai Park tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 她明天將要去叢臺公園。

sentences.english: The characters in planning and design of Congtai pcnjing garden in Handan city are described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了邯鄲市叢臺盆景園規劃設計的特點。

sentences.english: Will she go to Congtai Park tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 她來日誥日將要去叢臺公園嗎？
